storyInfo:
Facing the combined offensive of the L.G.D. and the black raincoats, the Yeti Squadron defends their only way out.
FrostNova taps deep into her Arts to stave off the enemies, but her body has reached its limit.

attributes.content: *Pant* *pant*... Impressive!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: The black raincoats are retreating! Run while you can!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Don't thank us. If you have the strength, you should fight alongside us!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Did you see him swing down from the fourth floor and graze my head like that? If I didn't freeze his weapon with the Originium FrostNova left in my backpack, I wouldn't be standing here!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Very impressive. They're just like the swordsmen in the gas masks back in Ursus. Even stronger, really!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: You almost died, what are you so excited about? The masked swordsmen you're talking about were the Ursus Royal Guard! We only met five of them that time!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Did you count how many raincoats there are?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Does that mean we're even more awesome than before?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: This is not a time for jokes. Their techniques and their equipment mean they must have a city... Even the craftsmen of multiple cities supplying them.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: There's no way we can beat them back on our own. Don't even think about trying to kill them!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: I just... I just think I did pretty well.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: The point is this situation is way beyond what we can handle... We can't hold out for long!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Quiet!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Reporting in.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Sister, these are... Faust's people.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*... I recognize them.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova, we received your message, and...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Why is Mephisto with you? What happened to him?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Mephisto has taken some... hits to his psyche.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Him? Traumatized?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Wait, where is Faust?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Faust stayed behind to give us, and others, a chance to escape. We left him outside the slums.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It's hard to come back from that.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Faust was a brave warrior.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova, if we could, we would like to fight alongside the Yetis.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You could. We must get our remaining people out safely.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Find a sniping position and await orders. We will need your support in the coming battle. We don't know when the enemy may attack again.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Pass our location to all teams: We will guarantee a safe route for their retreat from here!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Keep evacuating.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Are they like the Ursus soldiers with a total disregard for collateral damage?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I don't think so. The Ursus were willing to use direct artillery fire on the upper city!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: I knew they were brutal. But that brutal?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: We saw it with our own eyes.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: The raincoat people are very different.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: They see civilians as targets, since they can't tell the difference between Infected and uninfected. They don't know if maybe we're dressing up as civilians.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: The Ursus just didn't care, but these people don't let a single one slip through.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: There are so many fleeing, it's damn near impossible to keep order! FrostNova is in a tough spot!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Sister won't let anyone die. Reunion or no.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: We came to Lungmen to fight. How did we end up saving people? It's funny.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: The fighting is pretty much done. If you guys didn't show up, we'd all be dead!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Man that's crazy. You're really counting on us?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Can you not talk like that...? I used to think you guys were so imposing, but now you just seem like a bunch of clowns.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You got us all wrong. We just don't talk much. Shouldn't be imposing.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Anyway, aren't we supposed to be holding this place with you?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You're totally right! Bro, let's defend this place together!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We... we found some locals locked up in here.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: A mother and daughter. We were going to use the place as a firing position, but we don't know how to communicate with them... They seem pretty scared of us.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: (Local language)!
attributes.name: Lungmenite

attributes.content: (Local language) ...... (local language) ......!
attributes.name: Lungmenite

attributes.content: She is your child, yes?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Waaahhh!
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Such a healthy one.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. Don't cry. Your mama is right here.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Mama is here.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Waaahhh...
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Mm... Um... Mm.
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Child

attributes.content: Oh, the child is smiling...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Get her out of here.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...... (Local language)?
attributes.name: Lungmenite

attributes.content: You *cough* escort her. See her to safety.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They're uninfected. There are so many of our people who need evacuating. We don't have time.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Right. Who cares whether it's the Infected or the uninfected now? Understood.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Erm, uh, ma'am, um... Komm zis way?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Neidei, neidei... hou.
attributes.name: Lungmenite

attributes.content: FrostNova, Sister, wait for us to come back. Don't try to hold on your own.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Have some faith in your big sister.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Hurry! They're coming!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They are deploying some units wearing other uniforms... They might be Lungmen's L. G. D.!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough* ... *hack*.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Go!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The temperature is as low as it will go!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: The uniformed ones are no match for us, but watch out for the raincoats!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Where's Nesti? We need more firepower. We need suppressing fire!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: He says okay!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: I don't think Sister's body can take much more. She can't keep the temperature down!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: We can't break the pavement?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: No way! If we do that, how will our people and the locals get to the exit?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: We're sure this is the only way out?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Yes. The other ones have all been destroyed. All that's left is the one we dug.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: How much time do we have? Or how much time does Sister have?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Why must it come down to tormenting her so?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: They're almost done!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: I'll go get Sister!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Sister, we've just about got this group evacuated!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: And the fighting... how goes?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We've got the L. G. D. completely suppressed. The terrain favors us, and they can't make use of their superior numbers.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: You have nothing to hide.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Lungmen's raincoat brigade doesn't care about the terrain, or the people. They... they're going to level everything.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: They're purging the slums
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: And those uninfected Lungmenites we saw...?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'm afraid that was their doing.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: Sister, stop your Arts! We can handle these ones ourselves. Just rest for a bit!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Sister!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member C

attributes.content: The temperature just cracked the lower limit!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: She's doing it...! The superstructure is weakening!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Smash their footing and push them back! Fire!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: They're falling back! Keep it up!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Faster! More! Faster!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: R- right!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: That's our big sister! She really did it!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Petrova, what's wrong? Why do you look so gloomy?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: ...Sister?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Young, come here.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Young

attributes.content: Come!
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: I can't!
attributes.name: Young

attributes.content: You have to. Sister doesn't have much time left.
attributes.name: Petrova
